title: Andromeda
summary: "The Andromeda is a massive freighter, utilized by the Trade Union for transporting bulk cargo when danger is not of large concern or it has sufficient escort. Although it is practically stationary in terms of speed and agility, its cargo capacity is in a league of its own."
full_text:
Andromeda
"The Andromeda is a massive freighter, utilized by the Trade Union for transporting bulk cargo when danger is not of large concern or it has sufficient escort. Although it is practically stationary in terms of speed and agility, its cargo capacity is in a league of its own."
ENTER INFORMATION HERE
